index.name: angularjs
index.subtitle: AngularJS
index.about: AngularJS is a toolset for building the framework most suited to your application development. It is fully extensible and works well with other libraries. Every feature can be modified or replaced to suit your unique development workflow and feature needs.
index.description: Read the best free ebooks about AngularJS framework.

books.title: Angular Testing Succinctly
books.description: Though sometimes perceived as a hurdle, testing can save developers from heartbreak in the long run. In Angular Testing Succinctly, author Joseph D. Booth provides a quick introduction to different tools and approaches to testing Angular projects to make them higher quality from the start and easier to maintain down the road. Topics covered include lint checking, test-driven development, unit testing, and end-to-end testing. Tools covered include TSLint, ESLint, SonarLint, Karma, Jasmine, Protractor, and Cucumber.
books.author: Joseph D. Booth

books.title: Angular 2 Succinctly
books.description: Angular 2 is a massively popular JavaScript framework built to take advantage of component development in web apps. In Angular 2 Succinctly, author Joseph D. Booth will guide you through setting up a development environment, interacting with the Angular CLI, building Hello World, and more. By the end, you’ll know how to set up templates, compose components from those templates, and tie them all together with modules to deliver a cohesive web app.Angular 2 is a massively popular JavaScript framework built to take advantage of component development in web apps. In Angular 2 Succinctly, author Joseph D. Booth will guide you through setting up a development environment, interacting with the Angular CLI, building Hello World, and more. By the end, you’ll know how to set up templates, compose components from those templates, and tie them all together with modules to deliver a cohesive web app.
books.author: Joseph D. Booth

books.title: Angular Basics
books.description: A free interactive book, covering directives, modules, services, controllers, routing, and more.
books.author: Chris Smith

books.title: AngularJS Succinctly
books.description: Perform common tasks and overcome common problems in Angular.js.
books.author: Frederik Dietz

books.title: Practical AngularJS
books.description: Real-world examples of using AngularJS in multiple scenarios and platforms (KarmaJS, Firebase, Eclipse, WebStorm, O2 Platform)
books.author: Dinis Cruz
